Perceptor:

"How the Young ones are impatient"sighed Perceptor"If the new comer 
wish or attempt to destroy our leader, he won't be able to lef the 
base with life... Hydras can care himself and he could tell us 
without visitors knows that he needs our help... Come young one, do 
you belive that Our leader is defenless as a new born kitten?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> DeathSteel::
> 
> He was stopped by the door. He turned and walked back to 
> Perceptor. "Why did you stop me? I want to fight for our leader. 
Why 
> stop me from helping?" his rage showing in his optics, but his 
face 
> showing restraint. 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:
> > 
> > "Doors LOCK UP!!!" commanded Perceptor. The doors of corritor 
shut 
> > up not allowing anyone come in or left the area
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> 
wrote:
> > > DeathSteel::
> > > 
> > > "What?!" his optics wide. "Didn't come here to join us? Then 
why? 
> > To 
> > > gain rule over us?" He drew his plasma blaster. "I'll make 
sure 
> > the 
> > > new comer is short lived if that is the case. " and started to 
> > storm 
> > > off down the hall. 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:

> > > > 
> > > > "True, true"replied Perceptor "But something told me that 
this 
> > new 
> > > > comer didn't come to join us..."
> > > >
